text: I used a repeater for the timeline on this page <https://www.conn3ct.com/unified-communications-complete-guide>

Hi developers, is there any way to use the HubSpot module in WordPress website?? in the WordPress website i am using HubSpot blog so i need to list HubSpot rescent posts module in a  Wordpress page.  Is that possible?? Can a tone please help!!!
you could use an RSS feed to import recent posts. Look for an RSS feed plugin in WordPress or there might be one built into Jetpack.
Thanks <@U7V9DQ31P> Is this can be done through API?
